mapper.sql: psid, pssetid, pstotal, psmax, psmin, pscategory, pstype, is_active, psdescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt
mapper.select: select distinct ps1.pstotal as force,ps2.pstotal as limit,ps3.psmax as alter from maritime.major m left join maritime.pointset ps1 on m.mpointset = ps1.pssetid and ps1.pscategory = 4 left join maritime.pointset ps2 on m.mpointset = ps2.pssetid and ps2.pscategory = 5 left join maritime.pointset ps3 on m.mpointset = ps3.pssetid and ps3.pscategory = 6 where m.mname=#{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select coalesce(sum(c1.copoint),0) as curforce,coalesce(sum(c2.copoint),0) as curlimit, coalesce(sum(c3.copoint),0) as curalter1,coalesce(sum(c4.copoint),0) as curalter2, coalesce(sum(c5.copoint),0) as curalter3,coalesce(sum(c6.copoint),0) as curalter4 from maritime.score s inner join maritime.examination e on s.seid = e.eid and etype = 9 and e.is_active = true left join maritime.course c1 on e.ecid = c1.coid and c1.is_active = true and c1.cocategory = 4 left join maritime.course c2 on e.ecid = c2.coid and c2.is_active = true and c2.cocategory = 5 left join maritime.course c3 on e.ecid = c3.coid and c3.is_active = true and c3.cocategory = 6 and c3.cotype = 16 --创新 left join maritime.course c4 on e.ecid = c4.coid and c4.is_active = true and c4.cocategory = 6 and c3.cotype = 17 --综合 left join maritime.course c5 on e.ecid = c5.coid and c5.is_active = true and c5.cocategory = 6 and c3.cotype = 18 --经管法 left join maritime.course c6 on e.ecid = c6.coid and c6.is_active = true and c6.cocategory = 6 and c3.cotype = 19 --理工 where s.is_active = true and cast(s.score as real)>=e.etotalscore*0.6 and s.ssid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(s.sid) as allcourse,round(cast(sum(s.point)/count(s.sid) as numeric),2) as allcoursepoint from maritime.score s inner join maritime.examination e on s.seid = e.eid and etype = 9 and e.is_active = true inner join maritime.course c1 on e.ecid = c1.coid and c1.is_active = true and c1.cocategory in (4,5) where s.is_active = true and s.ssid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by s.ssid

select count(s.sid) as allcourse,round(cast(sum(s.point)/count(s.sid) as numeric),2) as allcoursepoint from maritime.score s inner join maritime.examination e on s.seid = e.eid and etype = 9 and e.is_active = true inner join maritime.course c1 on e.ecid = c1.coid and c1.is_active = true and c1.cocategory = 4 and c1.is_degree = true where s.is_active = true and s.ssid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by s.ssid

select stu.snumber as stunumber,stu.sname as stuname,sum(s.point) as allcoursepoint, sum(case when cast(s.score as real) < e.etotalscore*0.4 then 1 else 0 end) as nopass,count(e.ecid) as allcourse from maritime.score s inner join maritime.examination e on s.seid = e.eid and e.is_active = true and e.etype = 9 inner join maritime.student stu on stu.is_active = true and s.ssid = stu.sid inner join maritime.course c on e.ecid = c.coid and c.is_active = true and c.cocategory in (4,5) where s.is_active = true and e.is_active = true and stu.is_active= true and e.eterm = #{term} and stu.sclass = #{cid} group by stu.sid order by allcoursepoint desc
mapper.insert: insert into maritime.pointset (psid, pssetid, pstotal, psmax, psmin, pscategory, pstype, is_active, psdescription, last_update_user, last_update_dt) values (#{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pssetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pstotal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{psmax,jdbcType=REAL}, #{psmin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pscategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{psdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into maritime.pointset
psid,
pssetid,
pstotal,
psmax,
psmin,
pscategory,
pstype,
is_active,
psdescription,
last_update_user,
last_update_dt,
#{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pssetid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pstotal,jdbcType=REAL},
#{psmax,jdbcType=REAL},
#{psmin,jdbcType=REAL},
#{pscategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{pstype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
#{psdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update maritime.pointset
pssetid = #{pssetid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pstotal = #{pstotal,jdbcType=REAL},
psmax = #{psmax,jdbcType=REAL},
psmin = #{psmin,jdbcType=REAL},
pscategory = #{pscategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pstype = #{pstype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT},
psdescription = #{psdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where psid = #{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update maritime.pointset set pssetid = #{pssetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pstotal = #{pstotal,jdbcType=REAL}, psmax = #{psmax,jdbcType=REAL}, psmin = #{psmin,jdbcType=REAL}, pscategory = #{pscategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pstype = #{pstype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{isActive,jdbcType=BIT}, psdescription = #{psdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dt = #{lastUpdateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where psid = #{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
